Class ProductFactory

java.lang.Object
src.ProductFactory
public class ProductFactory extends Object
A factory class for allocating and searching products.

  • Method Details

    • loadProducts

      public Boolean loadProducts(String fileName, String jsonArray)
      Loads products from a JSON file into the factorys product map.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the JSON file.
      jsonArray - The name of the JSON array containing product data.
      Returns:
      true if products are loaded successfully, false if not.

      Gets a product by its name or ID.
      Parameters:
      nameOrID - The name or ID of the product.
      Returns:
      The product if found, null if not.
